name: Jeurissen Search
content_security_policy: default-src 'none'; child-src 'none'; connect-src 'none'; font-src 'none'; frame-src 'none'; img-src 'none'; manifest-src 'none'; media-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; prefetch-src 'none'; worker-src 'none'; script-src 'none'; script-src-attr 'none'; script-src-elem 'none'; style-src 'self'; style-src-attr 'none'; style-src-elem 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'none'; block-all-mixed-content; upgrade-insecure-requests; sandbox allow-same-origin allow-forms; require-sri-for script style; report-uri https://api.jeurissen.co/reports/csp/webext/nts/
